title: Regular (Scots-Irish, and Native American)DILF ISO 2spirit 4LTR
text:
Hello gentlemen, thank you for taking the time to look at my post.
I'm 48yo young, kind of scruffy guy. A bit of a technophile / geek / dork.
I love scifi and fantasy, and anime. I like the outdoors, reading, writing, drawing and playing world of Warcraft.
Of nationality I'm scots-Irish, Welsh, German, and native (great grandfather - Mohawk on mom's side, and great grandmother - Lakota on my father's side). I was raised with a great respect for my heritages (with the exception of my father - who hated the fact my grandparents included anything other then Anglo/Christian things). I'm far from perfect, but things I value are central to my beliefs. Honesty, compassion, loyalty, honor (of self, others, and the environment), spirituality, are some of the things that come to mind first. I tend to be a big lovable, geeky/dorky goofball. That's not to say I'm not quite and introspective......I'm an ENTP personality type, that just happens to be an Aries, born in the year of the goat.....if your into such things.
I'm the oldest of seven children, so come from a large family...spread across several states from WI (where I was born), to FL, IL, CA, and most recently HI (where I currently live). All boys, and one girl (the youngest). With quite an age spread due to my birth parents divorcing and my father remarrying. 
Not that looks / appearance is the major deciding factor for me, never has been. However in an effort to be as truthful in my approach as possible here are my stats, etc. I'm six foot one inches tall, currently weigh 200 pounds (quit smoking recently and wow......over 20 pounds up in about two months), with a thirty one sized waist. I'm letting my hair grow again, which is coming in more gray then not.....have a goatee, and green eyes. I'm semi hairy, have a couple tattoos, both ears are pierced though I've not worn anything in a long time, and my left nipple is pierced.
I'm a jeans and tshirt kind of guy, though in the present climate its more cargo shorts and flip-flops. When I worked full time I was a suit, shirt and tie guy (former consultant / project manager, retired now.)
I'm in no rush, but am mindful that it's well passed the time to pay attention to myself and my needs (in the heart/emotional realm). I've spent far to many years alone/single....an no that doesn't mean I've had allot of one nighters, etc. To/for me physical intimacy is something shared with someone I've a good/deep emotional connection to/with. I've only had one relationship in my life, it lasted for almost four years, till he passed away Thanksgiving 1991. After that I put up walls and threw myself into my career.

Well thats enough for now, don't want to be posting overly large considering the forum. If you've interest, shoot me an email with some details about yourself, etc am open to dialog with anyone, but at the moment am really hoping to find another native american based person to start a new chapter in my life with. title: Married Man 4 Married Man
text:
A closed-loop relationship (CLR) consists of two married men who don't cheat on their wives with other women and who don't fool around with other guys. It's an actual friendship between the guys, not just a physical liaison. And, the bond between the guys is separate from the married relationship they have with their wives. The goal is to provide marital stability and to bond with another guy.

There are many reasons why a married man would not consider coming out, most often these include strong family bonds and children. In the end, each man has his reasons for seeking this type of specific arrangement. This is another facet of the multitude of M2M paths present in society today.

You can be bi, straight, gay, bi-curious, or just curious, or anything in between. As long as you're a man married to a woman, plan on staying married, have a need to bond with another guy, and IF physical relations are to be involved, are willing to commit to only that guy, or are a single man willing to commit to monogamy and respect for the married partner's marriage.

There is a Yahoo Group for men who are in or seek a CLR. This site is for all guys who agree with the principles of this concept. This is a tasteful, safe environment for guys to discuss with and meet other like-minded guys. Here is the link to join:

groups(dot)yahoo(dot)com/neo/groups/Closed-Loop/info

Note: In order to access the above site, you will need to log into your Yahoo account/ID and then go to above link (replace the word 'dot' with a period when entering this address in your browser). There you will have the option to join the group and gain full access to group, and the information there. You cannot access this group unless you sign up for a Yahoo account or have a Yahoo account already.
